name: twitch-questions
observations: Web-based Twitch chat logger and viewer.
Displays real-time chat and questions for a specified Twitch channel.
Logs all chat messages, detects and logs !question messages and @channelowner tags separately.
Provides a real-time web interface using socket.io, tmi.js, and express.
Supports text-to-speech for questions and prevents message duplication.
MIT licensed. See README.md for setup and usage details.
